column5: All the films that I watched, both in cinemas and streaming, that released during 2022. UPDATE (Nov. 12): A few changes with the positions of certain films, including "Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness", which I now think was too high on the list, mainly because, in retrospect, I now see the issues with it, so I doubt that after a second viewing the 4.5 stars will remain as my rating.

column2: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
